reviewText: DVD Numero Six. The series is in full swing. Nothing particularly interesting but do  please note that episode Episode 26 is just a clip show, just a recap (They probably ran out of Ideas) so they decided also to run T.M. Revolution lead singer Takanori Nishikawa's newest music into the ground, so that will be several points against the DVD, since you really only get 4 episodes. The episodes included  are as follows:Phase 26: Moment (The clip show)Phase 27: Endless RondoPhase 28: KiraPhase 29: Turning PointPhase 30: Flashing BladesHence, If you've read my previous reviews, you know who  I reccomend this to: Sci Fi, Anime or Gundam fans, but this DVD may not REALLY be worth your money, since you only get 4 episodes, but hey, they have some " TV historical" value..
Title: N/A

reviewText: This dvd features one of the greatest fights in the series (personal favorite)but you only get 4 episodes because the first one is just a clip show but let me tell ya even the clip show is awsome, sure its a recap of all that we all well know but what makes it great for me has to be the music played out trough the whole episode and dvd. It's really a great series and even a clip show deserves credit...^_^
summary: Even a clip show deserves credit....

reviewText: This is where the whole series changes direction.Through pain and a final fight, Athrun and Kira end their feud and start anew. This is must see!This is the volume where all is explained, don't miss it! I also recommend buying 1-5 first.
